structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Board Of Registration In Medicine; Review And Approval Of Rules And Regulations
law.text: The commissioner of public health may review and approve rules and regulations proposed by the board of medicine. Such regulations will be deemed approved unless disapproved within fifteen days of submission to the commissioner; provided, however, that any such disapproval shall be in writing setting forth the reasons for such disapproval.
